answerText: Guglielmo Marconi[10] These two scientists independently proposed the existence of the ionosphere in 1902. The E region of the atmosphere is still sometimes named for these two scientists.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 8 | 2 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Identify these people who contributed to the discovery of the ionosphere, for 10 points each: [10] The ionosphere was postulated to explain the results of this man's experiment transmitting radio waves across the Atlantic Ocean. He is usually claimed to be the inventor of the radio.
